channel.title: Umls on WNCBB's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Umls on WNCBB's blog

item.title: Uml
item.description: 继承 实线空心三角箭头 Son->Father 实现 虚线空心三角箭头 Dog->IDog 关联 实线箭头 B(B.A)->A 依赖 虚线箭头 B(B.Method(A))->A 组合 contains a 尾部为实心菱形的箭头 Human->Head 聚合 has a 尾部为空心菱形的实线 Teacher(Teacher.Students)->Student golang # 从golang代码里生成plantuml代码 goplantuml -aggregate-private-members -show-aggregations -show-compositions -show-connection-labels -show-implementations -title <title> <golang path> > output.txt # 生成uml图 java -jar ~/plantuml.jar ./output.txt
